hire_me.subject: 💼 Job offer
hire_me.body: Hi Piotr,%0D%0A%0D%0AI would like to hire you.

chat.title: Piotr Bot
chat.welcome_message: I'm Piotr Bot. I'm here to help you with any questions you may have about me.
chat.How_can_I_help_you_today: How can I help you today?

hire.Thank_you_for_your_interest: Thank you for your interest! I'm looking forward to working with you.
hire.Please_send_me_an_email: Please send me an email. I will be happy to answer all your questions.

tell_me.message:
I am a FullStack Developer who loves developing products and definitely has a can-do attitude. I like to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends, hence my interest in design and commercial experience in AI. 

I love working with people who have a passion for what they do and want to create something unique. As a Tech Lead, I focus on honest communication, understanding business and technical needs, as well as teaching and developing the team.

I believe that knowledge is for sharing, and not to keep for yourself. I am open to a new challenge, so if you are interested in working with me, let me know!

experience.message:
I have been active on the IT market since 2017. In my first job as an IT specialist, I gained experience in working with clients and gained extensive knowledge of servers and networks. 

In 2020, my commercial adventure as a FullStack Developer began, which in 2022 it turned into the role of Tech Leader. During this time, I gained experience in working with various technologies, such as Angular, Laravel, Typscript, PHP, Node.js, FastAPI, MongoDB, PostgreSQL.

Working on the development of a huge ERP project created since 1989, I have experienced problems of scale, integration with many other systems/services and migration. 
In such a large project, I gained experience in team management, planning, estimating, as well as project management. 
Recent years have allowed me to gain experience in AI projects such as AI chat, predictive models. 

If you want to learn more about my experience, please visit my LinkedIn or CV at the bottom of the page.

projects.message: I'm glad you're interested in my projects. Come and see them on my website.

chat.Can_I_help_you_with_anything_else: Can I help you with anything else?
